Name: chandrasekhar g
Title: Peacefull temple place
Review: Lord balaji templefar away from hyderabad city, from hyathnagar , frequently autos will be available.RTC buses will available only in specific timings. I have reached L B Nagar metro --> then take auto/rtc bus to hyath nagar bus stand ---> autos will be available directly to sanghi temple.Own vehicles should pay parking fees. Prasadam will available but we have pay fees.temple canteen also available.overall its good to spend some time in a day.

Name: soumyadevanaboina
Title: Peacefully located Away from Congested City
Review: Peaceful environment, good to visit and spend time. Must visit Balaji temple, many movie shoots happen here.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Go for the Parrot fortune tellers
Review: Located on back side of Ramoji film city, the only reason to come here is for the great views from the top and the parrot fortune tellers who sit near the entrance gate.

Name: Surya Katakam
Title: Peaceful Atmosphere near by in City
Review: Sanghi temple is located in Sanghi Nagar which is back side of the Ramoji Film City. The temple complex is located on the top of Paramanand Giri Hill's, which is @ 35 km away from Hyderabad. Raja gopuram can be seen from several kilometers away.This temple is built in Cholla Chalukya style of Architecture, in the year of 1991. Construction took place 18 months to complete. This temple is developed and maintained by Leading Industrial group of Sanghi. Presently this temple is managed by Mrs Anita Sanghi of the Sanghi family.Kshetra Palak of this temple is lord Anjaneya who's temple is at the foot of the Hill which is located right of the main Entrance.Presiding Deity lord Venkateshwara inside the sanctum is 9 feet tall and is same as the one at Tirumala. Right side to the main temple is Padmavathi Amma temple who is main goddess of this temple. Ashta Laxmi temple is situated little back side between these two temples.  Lord Rama temple is located besides Main temple in the back side line. The temple of Lord Vijaya Ganapathi is next to Srirama temple. Karthikeya temple is located left to the Ganesh temple.Residing on the left of main deity is Lord Shiva who is seated on a lotus. standing next to Lord Shiva is Shakti Swarupini Kamalambhika. Further away is the temple of lord Durga and Nava Graha Mandapam is there in open place which is near Durga temple.There are two ways to reach this temple one is steps way which is very inclined and moderately difficult to climb and other route is Ghat road which is for vehicles to climb on top and there is parking facility available at the end of this small distance ghat road.Temple Timings: Morning 08:00 to 01:00; Evening 04:00 to 08:00 (Mon-Fri Day)Morning 08:00 to Evening 08:00 (Sat, Sun day & Holidays)

Name: Mutukuloju Pranay
Title: Temple
Review: Once upon it is a devotional area.good ambiance.good number of shootings of the movies. now it has become park for many of college students. kindly temple authorities should look into it

Name: Bhaskar D
Title: Complete Peace of Mind
Review: One of the great temple to be around. Perfect location, mesmerizing view, a true holy feelings. Very nicely maintained.

Name: sunil
Title: Serene place
Review: The temple is located at hill. Peacefulness prevails in entire premises but the only con is that the steps are not well built.

Name: TE K
Title: Devotional
Review: This is very famous temple in secunderabad and the dirty here is lord Venkateswara. He is very powerful, coming to the temple it is calm and beautiful located nearly 20 km from the lb near. It is one of the must see location

Name: sree143in
Title: lord venkateswara
Review: Sanghi temple is very famous in Hyderabad very big area built, peaceful will feel you after swamy darshan.

Name: anil19584
Title: Serene atmosphere
Review: Nice place to be in the evenings. Have sufficient parking place. Premises are neat. Great views and peaceful atmosphere. Most of the movie shootings take place here

Name: Lpr @SrivariSevak
Title: Very peaceful divine experience.
Review: It looks similar to Tirumala. What a peaceful place. It's about 20 km distance from Lb Nagar. Sanghi Temple, The main deity here is Lord Balaji, Sri Venkateswara Swamy.One would feel the essence of the temple once they stand near to the main grabhalaya. You would feel as if you were in Tirumala.The temple timings are 8am-12pm and 4pm-8pm. You can also perform Archana there. The Duration in between each Archana is 1hour. You can also have darshan of Lord Shiva and Lord Ganesha, Lord Murugan, and Lord maa Durga there. It symbolizes no difference between Lord Shiva and Keshava. You will experience the divinity at temple premises. The best time is to visit in the early hours of the morning and evenings. Plan accordingly and enjoy the experience. Shubham.                       Om namo venkateshaya.

Name: sai dudapaka
Title: top of the god
Review: Temple placed amidst thick greenery on top of the hill.This is about 30 kms away from the city on a hill-top and offers beautiful view

Name: Pavan K
Title: Good place to visit for long drive
Review: Placed in outskirts of city and connected very close ORR . This will be ideal place to visit . However in recent past maintenance of temple have gone down . Also beware of monkeys snatching food from our hands

Name: Nagesh Eco Ventures
Title: On top of the hill.
Review: Temple placed amidst thick greenery on top of the hill. used to visit here often when I was working at Ramoji Film City, Hyderabad.

Name: Vikram
Title: A temple on the hill top away from city
Review: This is about 30 kms away from the city on a hill-top and offers beautiful view. This was built by the rich Sanghi family and they have their industry close by. Best to visit either early morning or in the evening. There are temples dedicated to each God inside the complex and it is nice. Some people even visit this place after their Ramoji film city tour.

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: It's an awesome and peaceful temple away from all the disturbances
Review: It's very nice and I peaceful temple that you must visit whenever you go to Hyderabad. We used to visit this atleast once in three months. But now it is after a long gap I visited this temple. It's very peaceful, calm and serene. We used to come with our family member but  mostly with room mates and friends. It is close to Ramoji Film City. One of the most popular place in Hyderabad.The temple has continuous steps that when you see for the first time you get scared. But you can manage if have the habit of climbing steps.* It's not to scare you just to inform. These are not many steps. Hope they must be approximately 25 to 40 steps.Thank the management they built a pipeline to hold while climbing the steps.Once you go to the top you will enjoy 3 or 4 temples with white washed and a well maintained lawn between and infront of the temples. It looks so beautiful.You must visit this temple atleast once if you like peace. These temples look more beautiful in the evening light.You will have more buses from Dilshuknagar.

Name: ramesh
Title: The picturesque temple oh Hyderabad
Review: The temple is located on a hill top at the outskirts of the city. The preceding deity is Lord Venkateswara. The temple looks very great and peaceful.

Name: TravellingReddy
Title: An attraction near to Ramoji Fim city
Review: If plan of RFC is on minds then its prudent to have this temple covered as well. The most shot location in tollywood movies for any temple sequence. Looks nice and is on a small hillock.

Name: siva j
Title: Overrated in terms of beauty
Review: The Lord Venkateswara temple, obviously serene and divine like any other Indian temple. But in terms of maintenance and beauty this temple is pretty overrated for a non-hyderabadi like me.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: nice and peaceful
Review: This temple gives us a pleasant feeling and people usually visit it in weekends more than normal days.Must see

Name: venkat k
Title: Shooting spot
Review: Located far from the, you can find this Temple in many of the Telugu movies. Located on hills. Good to visit

Name: MSR
Title: Sanghi Temple, HYB
Review: A serene place developed and being managed by prominent business family “Sanghi”, a temple complex located on top of a hill “Paramananda Giri” built in early 1990s. This temple complex can be reached via Hyderabad- Vijayawada highway. This place is popular destination where numbers of movies were shot.One can reach by climbing steps as well as by road. The gopuram of this temple can be seen from very far place due to strategically located on a hill. Especially spending at this place at evenings is memorable. But, being a secluded place needs personal transport and public transport is limited until main road only.

Name: Sateesh
Title: Sanghi Temple
Review: Sanghi Temple is a pleasant place to visit. Most of the Telugu films are going to shoot there.It is a very good place to get Your mind peace.I hope to visit again next time

Name: Devaa
Title: A hilltop temple!!!
Review: Visited this place on my way to Ramoji film city. Its beautifully located on the outskirt of the city nestled on a hilltop. The white temple is visible from far of.Lots of people visit the place in weekend.The view from the temple top is very scenic.

Name: pvrkaushik
Title: Beautiful
Review: This place is situated on hilltop.. Beautiful land expanse. Mostly shootings happen here whenever temple scenes are shot... Little away from city

Name: kurukuntla raviteja
Title: Sanghi
Review: Sanghi Temple is located near sanghi Nagar there is beautiful place to wive form there most of the Telugu film are going to shoot there it is good place to enjoy

Name: SRC4297
Title: Pleasant place
Review: Pleasant place to visit and for Darshan. The temple is located on the top edge of hill which makes you to feel getting fresh air. I guess afternoon 1-3 is closed as lunch break.

Name: Daniel T
Title: Old times favourite
Review: When we grew up in Hyderabad, Sanghi temple was like a pilgrimage to visit. Its a one-day visit back then. But with the transport facilities this day, you can visit this place very easily.Few movies scenes are also filmed here. Famous for married couples & families to visit for worship.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Best temple
Review: This place has got its own natural appearance which makes it to shoot many films here.Best place to get your mind peace.

Name: sravan s
Title: lord balaji
Review: one of the famous temple which is situated in the outskirts of city. people comes here for having a peaceful mind. the nature is also very beautiful.

Name: ramakrishnabanoth3
Title: Pleasant one-Devotional place
Review: A very silent and calm place where many God's are there.Due to less rush ,you can have a good experience of devotional feel and spend time in the temple.Visit this temple with family on Vacation.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Temple in every other movie
Review: Located on a small type of hill is especially popular for movies as any movie which has a shot in ramoji is shooted here.P.S Tollywood

Name: panii2015
Title: Devine place
Review: One of the best temples in Hyderabad. Nice experience to travel from Hyderabad to Sanghi which is located outskirts. Wondered while visiting this place for the first time as we have seen many times n movies.

Name: chandrasekhar g
Title: Lord balaji temple
Review: Located far away from hyderabad city.Many stair steps to get the darshan of lord balaji.RTC buses are available from hyderabad city.Movie shooting will take place at sangi temple.

Name: Trending T
Title: One day great visit outskirts
Review: This place is located outside of the town but it has very good peace fulness and this place has also been ready to take many movies and also must visit place.

Name: karishma S
Title: Good one
Review: Very beautiful temple with mostly all God's and goddess. Very beautiful scenes around the temple, very calm place to meditate and relax. Lots of monkeys here, overall good place for Darshan, not much rush on regular days. Take your own food if you have small kids.

Name: VishuMittoo
Title: Long drive
Review: This place is good to be with your entire family including pets. There are a lot of monkeys to welcome you and they do not expect anything from you is the best part. We used to visit here with our pet and thankfully there were no restrictions.

Name: kalyan kumar g
Title: nice visit
Review: Sanghi Temple is a nice visit, nice temple, one of the famous temple in hyderabad, we have to knows about historical places

Name: idea614354
Title: Lord Venkateswara
Review: This is fully build with white marbel stone. good and nice place. lord venkateswara here gives darshan to all.

Name: rkmanchi
Title: Beware of the monkeys. A bit out the way unless you are visiting Film City
Review: Earlier there was a way to get to the temple through Film City. That’s been stopped now which probably tells you that the temple is gaining in popularity.Having said that, the temple needs better upkeep. The water in the taps at the entrance often runs dry. Can’t do much about the monkey menace too I guess. I firmly believe it’s the people who are causing it by the constant feeding and pampering. With some donation, you can get to go inside the sanctum sanctorum for a Darshan. The idol of Lord Venkateswara is well adorned and the Pooja is performed well.In summer the stone floor can get very hot to walk on so please be wary. Don’t carry any food and if you are carrying water please be wary of the monkeys. The temple is atop a hill but there is ample parking.

Name: Uttam17
Title: Film City Temple
Review: Very good temple to view near RFC, most films are taken in sanghi temple. nice place and peace with full of trees

Name: BNSantoshKumar
Title: Temple just for the view
Review: if want to go bit far from city and have some nice time AT TEMPLE , this can be it.it has a good view of mountains ( Ramoji Film City Side) and all greens and stones around.Well maintained Grass in temple premise mostly before and after a FILM SHOOTINGS.lots of couples come from surrounding colleges flunking classes.

Name: Lalitha G
Title: its a beautiful temple to visit atleast once.
Review: its a beautiful temple to visit atleast once. very long from city and most of the movie shooting will happen here. good visit with proper dresscode and visit with full trust. nice one to visit atleast once.

Title: Poor maintenance.. monkey trouble
Review: It's just commercial temple and shooting spot. Not much scenic and devotional place. One can see once.

Name: Anamika K
Title: Very pleasant temple
Review: It is very peaceful and cool place. Each and every person can visit this temple. It is outskirts of the city. Sanghi Temple is closed in the afternoon, it opens in the morning and evening. This place is very pleasant.

Name: Gaurab2017
Title: Good Holy Place - Sangi
Review: One of the spots for tolywood shooting is also known for its great architecture. Easily connected via bus and cabs. Great surroundings.

Name: Maayaanaa
Title: Sanghi Temple
Review: Its a beautiful temple, very well maintained and peaceful atmosphere..Its located near to Ramoji film city.You can get a nice view of the city as the temple is located on hilltop.

Name: G S
Title: Very peaceful location.
Review: The only place where we need to spent our plaesent day.It is the place Located by God of Venkateshwara Swamy.Beautify place and classic location.You can your Favorite God and goddess Here almost all Gods at one place You feel Happy when You visit this place.

Name: KMMAHAVADI
Title: degraded place
Review: earlier it was nice place. now dont know the reason but looks very dull.  no much visitors now a days.

Name: Sirisha D
Title: Peaceful temple away from the city
Review: A bit far from the city,  but very peaceful and serene. Main deity is Lord Balaji along with few other temples inside the complex. Not crowded on a normal day, can get very hot on a sunny day. Take care when you plan a day out over there.

Name: pjanil1968
Title: Divine temple
Review: Very nice temple. Calm and cool locality. Must visit temple in Hyderabad. Serene and divine temple. Ideal to visit with family over weekend

Name: ganeshks112
Title: Peaceful place Sangi Temple
Review: Sangi Temple is one of the Excellent religious attraction in Hyderabad.   The temple is quiet peaceful. This is the lord Venkateswara Temple located at top of the hill. There are 10 temples in the compound. It's a beautiful temple. Own vehicles are suitable for this place. The temple is very nice with cool environment.

Name: anil k
Title: Sanghi
Review: Located in sangi nagar beautiful peaceful temple.main embodiment is Lord venkateswara.25 km away from Hyderabad city, Sanghi temple. one of the hyderabad's sight seeing places.even appeared in various Telugu movies.there is exists pavitra vanam with beautiful flowers in that garden.temple also has a Kalyana Mandapam where marriages are performed.in night times the temple looks spectacular.

Name: yojanaredd
Title: Nice temple
Review: this temple has a collection of gods, and city view is good from temple.overall you can visit with your family in a weekend.

Name: NKReddy
Title: Divine & All Idols at one place .
Review: The temple is 40kms from ECIL .You can reach the temple through 2 routes . 1. Heading  through ORR.2. Regular route from TARNAKA-UPPAL- LB NAGAR - HAYATH NAGAR .The temple is located atop of the hill surrounded by  lush greenery .They charge ₹10/- for entry into the temple .At the entrance there is an Anjaneya Swamy Temple .You need to head towards a steep to reach the temple by vehicle or you can walk  through steps.The main Idol is Sri Venkateshwara Swamy ..There are few more small temples like Ganapathi, Subramanya Swamy , Radha Krishna , Sita Rama , Navagraha , Ambica devi ..The atmosphere here is so rejuvenating that you feel you are in another world with Bliss full thoughts..The most embarrassing/worst  thing that I've encountered is despite their is a display ,not to take photos inside the temple most of the people are busy taking selfies inside the temple and the look from priests says it all.When you are at the temple we need to maintain some decency and respect the instructions of the temple authorities.Om Namo Venkateshaya...

Name: higghligght shiva
Title: Nice Hill Top view of Sanghi temple
Review: Sanghi temple is very nice i didn't gone till now from many years, y means i think i don't want to go with any1,only for some1 Spl that is my lovable wife. so recently i got married so this is D first time i gone, so my dream is fulfill This place u can see many gods & godessess like Lord Venkateshwara swamy ,opp garuda right side astalakshmi beside Padmavati is there side by ticket counter for archanas,prasadam etcleft side radha krishna,beside ganesh,subramanya swamy ,durga devi, shivalingam ,nandhi,kamaleshwari and navagrahas r theremany shootings will run over there. There u can see many couples over there & most imp thing plz avoid monkeysif any cover sounds listen or sees that vl fastly come & drag D items Moreover parking areas bikes r kept & they gone inside 2 pray ,many monkeys r climbing D bike they r removing D items from inside D bike. plz dont put any items in bikes u know 1 thing I love D nature & animals ,if v vl harm them  then they vl harm us . its a nice place 4 friends & families mostly couples. Have a nice journey.

Name: arunbvkumar
Title: Cinema Temple
Review: As we were staying in Sitara-Ramoji city. we decided to visit the temple or else it is very far from the city. it is a quintessential temple,

Name: BRKanth
Title: Week end evening destination
Review: This is little far from the city especially from Hitech City etc. Could be seen once and is built by business men. No historical attraction.

Name: Shiva D
Title: family visit
Review: sanghi temple which is very famous in Hyderabad and every 1 would link to visit this temple with family and its very good temple and maintenance is also good

Name: Ranga M
Title: A temple too far
Review: This is quite far from Hyderabad. The temple is built by a local businessman b has nothing spectacular. Its worth giving it a miss

Name: Sai S
Title: good tourist place
Review: it is very beautiful located in hyderabad and it very good tourist place as well as pilgrimage place. . ...

Name: SupriyaAyaluru
Title: Superb view
Review: Very good atmosphere with all gods at one place.  Located near to Ramoji film city. Visited twice with my family

Name: Nagendra Kiran ... M
Title: About Temple
Review: Sanghi Temple Hyderabad: Situated in Sanghi Nagar which is 25 km away from Hyderabad city, Sanghi temple stands beautifully on the hillock ‘Paramanand Giri’. Built in the Chola-Chalukya style of architecture, the temple is a place worth visiting. This temple was built in the year of 1991 which was completed in a just 18 months! And since then it has been attracting tourists from everywhere. As the name suggests, it was developed by a leading industrial group of Southern India - Sanghi Group. They primarily operate their business from the city of Hyderabad.

Name: Sampath Kumar S
Title: Serene & Tranquil
Review: One of the peaceful & serene temples in the southern part of the city, and the best part is, the roads to reach the temple are with full of trees covering the entire length & breadth of the road. The easiest way to feel getting close to the nature. I just love taking that path, you feel refreshed. Good to be there at twilight enjoying the nature & calmness it has!

Name: ccwd w
Title: The Famous place for devotees
Review: sanghi temple is located at outskirts of hyderabad, the ambiance of the temple is cool,and the best place for film shootings, for a short drive and a perfect place for devotees.

Name: NEMMARAPARAMESWARAN
Title: good place
Review: Its in outskirts of hyderabad and nice place to visit and really good atmosphere surrounding and very much near to RFC.

Name: Rao1940497
Title: Decent Hindu shrine
Review: A Hindu religious place with presiding deities and it is a centre of attraction for all ages though remotly located.

Name: ch varun
Title: devotion with nature..
Review: The wonderful view from hill top makes the devotees feels as if one is visiting a theme park.The temple makes us astonishing not only by the location but also by the architecture... The primary deity Lord Venkateshwara appears in a full fledged look.One can't look away while watching the deity... The prasadam is also yummy...

Name: anithaaravamuthan
Title: Beautiful and Nice temple!!!
Review: Nice place to visit in Hyderabad. The temple was looking very beautiful from hill top. Well maintained and clean. Situated near ramoji film city. Nice temple.

Name: eeebvr
Title: Near Ramoji film city and one time worth seeing
Review: This temple is near Ramoji Film City and takes less than 30 mins to watch. This appeared in many local movies. it is almost 25 kms from hyderabad city. Check timinigs of temple before planning.

Name: vishaltelkar
Title: Very good
Review: Nice place with excellent view from top of the hillock.. visited this place quite a number of times. Well maintained area. Can be accessible by car also till the top.

Name: lankavignesh
Title: miles away
Review: it is a very peaceful temple but is very far from the city and we booked an ola we will face a problem during return.

Name: santosh2ind
Title: Sanghi temple
Review: Sanghi temple is a one of the  beautiful temple in hyderabad. it is good trip for friends and couples.

Name: kmegha911
Title: Soothing and Peaceful Place
Review: The temple open early in the morning at 5.00 am daily and 'Archana' or 'Aarti' is carried out to the deities from 6 am to 8 am.The temple has a relaxing and peaceful environment.

Name: krishna p
Title: Temple with shooting spot
Review: This temple is located in hyderabad near to ramoji film city where many tollywood films are shooted here and this temple is situated on the hill top and god is lord venkateswara swamy and well known to hyderabad people here there some times movie shootings and and location seems very good

Name: sandeep g
Title: Pleasant
Review: Nice, peaceful and pleasant place to visit , good and very nice ambience , must place to visit at least once

Name: VYR306
Title: Trip to Sanghi
Review: Ambiance of the temple is nice. You can see many monkeys here but they don't hurt. I visited here with my friends. It is about 30-35kms from Secundrabad.

Name: funesc111
Title: What can go wrong!
Review: 1. If you are using Uber/ Ola etc., remember that you can face problems during return, especially in the evening after 7 pm.  The cabs that we were trying to book on return were always 10-12 km away and they had to come through the Ramoji Film City, which i guess was not allowed so easily.  So it took us lot of time to get a cab in the evening.  And if you don't have a cab, you will be just stuck at the top2. There is no lift/ elevator/ mini bus facility and for elders, it is almost impossible to climb-up or down some 200 stairs (approximate) 3. The toilets (which are down stairs) can surely give you a UTI (urinary tract infection).  They are filthy.  There is just no water.  Taps are broken.  We did not find drinking water/ toilet facility at the top, where the temple is located4. Flooring around the temple is uneven.  Not even cemented properlyWhat is good - Playful monkeys, may be little bit of scenery during monsoons, and of course a thought about the Lord!!

Name: ClickAwayWithCanon
Title: A must visit Balaji Temple
Review: It is a very beautiful temple located in Sanghi Nagar in Hyderabad. One can either reach there through public transport (city buses plying from Koti to Sanghi) or own vehicles. The temple is located on a hill and there are 2 ways to reach to the top (steps/road). One can either climb the stairs or drive around to reach the top of the hill. There are temples of many deities once you reach the top. The architecture of the temples is splendid and one can get a good view of surroundings from the top. The Ramoji Film City is close by and is visible from the top of the hill. There are many hotels and stalls at the bottom of the hill where the city buses halt.

Name: akjeth
Title: Beautiful temple
Review: Although it is away from the city but certainly worth a visit for all temple lovers. Situated on an elevated ground, the marble temple provides one with a scenic view all around.

Name: koteswararao
Title: height of good temple
Review: good to see though it is out side city sculpture is good once it was the best before ramoji good trosport to see

Name: nagesh1955
Title: visit of sangi
Review: Very big temple in sourroundings of hyderabad. We can see many gods in this place. Most of the movies are suited at this place

Name: kesava113
Title: Sanghi temple
Review: Sanghi Temple, located at Sanghi Nagar in Telangana in India, is about 35 km from Hyderabad city. The sacred Raja Gopuram, which is very tall, can be seen from several kilometers away.

Name: vishalreddy_99
Title: Decent place to visit
Review: Far away from the Hyderabad city, need to fight plenty of traffic to get here. Overall a good experience.

Name: V V S Ganesh N
Title: Best for short Long rides
Review: Sanghi temple Located in out skirts of Hyderabad on Vijayawada highway is one off the best places to visit ( preferably in evenings ) with families of all ages.one can easily accessible by own transportation as well having well connectivity with public transportation also.

Name: Pallavi748
Title: Good temple but poorly maintained
Review: This temple is near to ramoji film city. I have seen this temple various time in all south indian movie so planned to visit. We visited in April .Temple is on hill top You have to climb stairs to visit temples no. of stairs are not much. the temple Architect is really very good but not maintained properly . All grass was dried and no plants. View from temple was good. you can plan to visit once

Name: priteshkulkarni
Title: Beautiful temple away from core city
Review: Sanghi Temple is bit away from City and made up of Marble. Beautiful carving and good to spend 1 hour.

Name: Saiprasad_2804
Title: Long Drive..Peace and Spiritual
Review: If you want to go for a temple on a drive within 50 Kms of hyderabad this is a must vsit temple.This temple is located near Ramoji film city and is very peaceful and spiritual.

Name: pasunuri k
Title: Beautiful temple
Review: Visited the temple several times and it would be better to be there in the evening times with a pleasant environment  for worship and one of the must visit temple in hyderabad

Name: Lucian0Cunha
Title: Beautiful temple you cannot miss
Review: This is a beautiful temple on the top of a hill.  Take your shoes off and come experience Hinduism and its many gods.  I really enjoyed the experience.  I recommend you ask a local friend to bring you over to share the full experience.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Excellent
Review: It is an excellent temple to visit. Awsome drive on the outer ring road. This temple is near ramoji film city.

Name: Bhargav C
Title: nice temple
Review: This is of Lord Venkateshwara's temple. It is nicely located outside hyderabad near to Ramoji filmcity. It is situated in very large area on the hills.

Name: Bhargav C
Title: looks good
Review: you might want to visit this place to experience the beauty of art and culture together. Located 35 kms away from Hyderabad

Name: srikanth423
Title: awesome temple
Review: we go once in a year..its awesome temple for friends ,lovers and for couples..make sure not to go between 12pm to 4pm..they will close it in this timings...

Name: rimjhim
Title: Not at all maintained!
Review: We went to Sanghi Temple yesterday as a part of a family outing. The timings on the internet were mentioned as 8:30 to 10:30 AM and 4 PM to 6 PM so we rushed to reach there on time in the evening. The road to the temple is quite nice. It doesnt feel as if you are in Hyderabad as there is greenery on both sides. The entrance hoarding to the temple showed different timings...Its open in the evenings from 4 PM TO 8 PM contrary to what is mentioned on the web and on Sundays it is open from 8AM to 8PM.The temple is not well maintained at all. The grass and greenery that was there a few years back is no longer there. There were muddy patches everywhere and very little of grass. No floral plants as seen a few years back. So the only so called beauty is in terms of the temple structure. The priests seemed highly reluctant to do any kind of "free" service like offering teertham , flowers etc. It was a major put off. We stayed there till 5:30pm and there was no light in the sanctum sanctorum which was dark inside and made it diffcult to see the idols. Very demotivated temple staff.The temple has quite some numbers of monkeys around which are a nuisance. They kept coming near us when we were seated on the benches , forcing us to leave the seats.Overall it was a disappointment. The only plus point was the weather. Theres no point driving to the outskirts of the city to see a barren temple land and priests who are highly demotivated!The citys Jagannath temple in Banjara hills seemed much better option !!

Name: madhuonly
Title: Beautiful temple
Review: white beautiful temple @ city out skirts near to ramoji film city. this temple is very famous in Hyderabad. for lord venkateswara. having pleasant climate and greenery and awesome place for all visitors.

Name: Krishna_2111
Title: Serene Temple.
Review: Been to this temple as a kid and multiple times along with friends. The drive from the city in the 90's was itself a great experience for youngsters. The temple itself is on top of a hill and is maintained beautifully.  It is all built in a white marble that enhances the beauty of the temple. There is a lot of place to sit peacefully and meditate on the lawn inside the temple premises. Most of the telugu movies are shot here owning to its beauty and popularity. For anyone living in Hyderabad or visiting, this is a must go.

Name: Vikranth R
Title: Peace of mind
Review: Sanghi is a temple were it is located outs cut of city...  It's is in a such a place where u can get a peace of mind..  The temple is situated at hilly area...  With good environment area.. Here many cinema shooting are done...

Name: Shalini R
Title: Beautiful temple
Review: One must visit this temple while in Hyderabad.  This is near the Ramoji rao film city. This is well connected in the city. The temple is closed during afternoons daily.

Name: superb114
Title: Heart Of Hyderabad
Review: The temple is located far away from Hyderabad you need to be there in the morning so that you can have an amazing experience here you can all the temples at one place.
